entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
